question: Fed decision in January?
rule:
The **FED interest rates** are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings. 

 The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for January 30 - 31, 2025 according to the [official calendar](https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.) 

 The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm. 

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their January meeting with relevant data is issued or up to 12 hours after. If no statement is released by the end date of the next scheduled meeting, this market will resolve to 'no change'.

question: Bitcoin Price: OVER/UNDER $100K after Trumps inauguration day?
rule: Using Coinbase Spot price for BTC/USD

question: Nottingham Forest @ Bournemouth (2025-01-25)
rule:
### Market Rule
This market resolves based on the outcome of the event: **Nottingham Forest @ Bournemouth (2025-01-25)**.

- The resolution source will be official match results from the governing body.
- If the event is postponed or canceled, the market will be voided.
